title: Single 3-Brane Brane-World in Six Dimension
abstract: The single 3-brane brane world at six dimension is examined when the extra dimensions are not compact. Although the warp factor diverges at the asymptotic region of the extra dimension, the normalizable zero mode and higher KK spectrum exist in the gravitational fluctuation. We compute the zero mode analytically and KK spectrum numerically. It is explicitly proven that our solution does not obey `brane world sum rule'.
